tit.cmt: 用語集には「Kyoto Music Expo」と登録されていますが、日本語の読み方が併記されていないと、略称(おんぱく)の説明が理解できないため、本文では併記しています。

sen.j: 京都音楽博覧会（きょうとおんがくはくらんかい）とは、2007年より毎年開催されている京都府の梅小路公園で行われる音楽フェスティバル。
sen.e: The term "Kyoto Ongaku Hakurankai" (Kyoto Music Expo) refers to a music festival that has been held annually since 2007 in Umekoji-koen Park in Kyoto Prefecture.
The term "Kyoto Ongaku Hakurankai (Kyoto Music Expo)" refers to a music festival that has been held annually since 2007 in Umekoji-koen Park, in Kyoto Prefecture.
The term "Kyoto Ongaku Hakurankai (Kyoto Music Expo)" refers to a music festival that has been held annually since 2007 in Umekoji-koen Park, in Kyoto Prefecture.
It is abbreviated to 'Onpaku.'
It's abbreviated as 'Onpaku.'
It's abbreviated as 'Onpaku.'

sen.j: 日本のロックミュージシャンのくるりが主催している。
sen.e: It is hosted by Quruli, a Japanese rock group.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: It is hosted by Quruli, a Japanese rock group.
It is hosted by Quruli, a Japanese rock group.

sen.j: アコースティック編成のシンプルな演奏が中心のイベントである。
sen.e: It is an event featuring simple performances by playing acoustic instruments.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: It's an event featuring simple performances played on acoustic instruments.
It's an event featuring simple performances played on acoustic instruments.
Access
Access
Access

sen.j: 会場である梅小路公園は、京都の市街地に位置する京都駅から徒歩15分の場所に位置する都市公園である。
sen.e: Umekoji-koen Park where it is to be held is an urban park that is a 15-minute walk away from Kyoto Station which is located in the urban area of Kyoto.
Umekoji-koen Park, the site of the event, is an urban park that's a 15-minute walk from Kyoto Station, which is located in the urban area of Kyoto.
Umekoji-koen Park, the site of the event, is an urban park that's a 15-minute walk from Kyoto Station, which is located in the urban area of Kyoto.

sen.j: 「近隣との結びつきや、地域振興により貢献していくお祭り」というスタンスを取る。
sen.e: The festival aims to contribute to the community by deepening relationships with the neighboring area and promoting regional development.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The festival aims to contribute to the community by deepening relationships with the neighboring area and promoting regional development.
The festival aims to contribute to the community by deepening relationships with the neighboring area and promoting regional development.

sen.j: FUJI ROCK FESTIVALに代表されるような他の大型音楽フェスティバルとは大きく異なる。
sen.e: It differs widely from other big music festivals such as FUJI ROCK FESTIVAL.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: It differs widely from other big music festivals such as the FUJI ROCK FESTIVAL.
It differs widely from other big music festivals such as the FUJI ROCK FESTIVAL.
Kyoto Ongaku Hakurankai 2007
Kyoto Ongaku Hakurankai 2007
Kyoto Ongaku Hakurankai 2007
It was held on September 23, 2007.
It was held on September 23, 2007.
It was held on September 23, 2007.

sen.j: 出演者のタイムテーブルは当日の朝発表された。
sen.e: The timetable for the performers was announced in the morning of that day.
The timetable for the performers was announced in the morning of that day.
The timetable for the performers was announced in the morning of that day.

sen.j: 出演アーティストは以下の通り。
sen.e: The following artists performed in the festival:
The following artists performed in the festival:
The following artists performed in the festival:

sen.j: くるり、ジェイソン・フォークナー、リアダン、タラフ・ドゥ・ハイドゥークス、大工哲弘、小田和正、ふちがみとふなと、Cocco
sen.e: Quruli, Jason Falkner, Liadan, Taraf de Haidouks, Tetsuhiro DAIKU, Kazumasa ODA, Fuchigami to Funato, and Cocco.
Quruli, Jason Falkner, Liadan, Taraf de Haidouks, Tetsuhiro DAIKU, Kazumasa ODA, Fuchigami to Funato, and Cocco.
Quruli, Jason Falkner, Liadan, Taraf de Haidouks, Tetsuhiro DAIKU, Kazumasa ODA, Fuchigami to Funato, and Cocco.

sen.j: なお、小田和正とくるりのデュエットで歌われた「ばらの花」は、2008年9月3日に発売されたシングル「さよならリグレット」の4曲目に収録されている。
sen.e: The song 'Bara no Hana' (Rose), on which Kazumasa ODA duetted with Quruli in the festival, was recorded as the fourth number of the single CD 'Sayonara Regret' (Goodbye to Regret).
sen.cmt: さよならリグレット: 用語集には「Sayonara REGRET (Goodbye to "REGRET")」と登録されていますが、大文字表記(REGRET)と引用符("")が指示書に反する可能性があるため、小文字に直し、引用符を外しました。
sen.e: The song 'Bara no Hana (Rose),' on which Kazumasa ODA performed as a duet with Quruli in the festival, was recorded as the fourth number on the CD 'Sayonara Regret (Goodbye to Regret).'
The song 'Bara no Hana (Rose),' on which Kazumasa ODA performed as a duet with Quruli in the festival, was recorded as the fourth number on the CD 'Sayonara Regret (Goodbye to Regret).'
Kyoto Ongaku Hakurankai 2008
Kyoto Ongaku Hakurankai 2008
Kyoto Ongaku Hakurankai 2008
It was held on September 6, 2008.
It was held on September 6, 2008.
It was held on September 6, 2008.

sen.j: 出演アーティストは以下の通り。
sen.e: The following artists performed in the festival:
The following artists performed in the festival:
The following artists performed in the festival:

sen.j: くるり、The Real Group、rei harakami、大工哲弘&カーペンターズ、アシャ、小田和正、細野晴臣&ワールドシャイネス、ハンバート ハンバート、Lana&Flip
sen.e: Quruli, The Real Group, rei harakami, Tetsuhiro DAIKU and The Carpenters, Asa, Kazumasa ODA, Haruomi HOSONO and The World Shyness, Humbert Humbert, and Lana and Flip.
sen.cmt: 原文で「大工哲弘カーペンターズ」となっていた箇所をWebで確認すると「大工哲弘&カーペンターズ」でしたので、原文を訂正しました。定訳は不明です。/アシャ: 用語集には「Asha」と登録されていますが、正しくは「Asa」です(http://asamusic.jp/index.html [注: アクセスすると音楽が再生されます])/原文で「細野晴臣ワールドシャイネス」となっていた箇所をWebで確認すると「細野晴臣&ワールドシャイネス」でしたので、原文を訂正しました。用語集には「The world shiness」と登録されていますが、正しくは「The World Shyness」です(http://dwww-hosono.sblo.jp/article/11429477.html)/ 原文で「LanaFlip」となっていた箇所をWebで確認すると「Lana&Flip」でしたので、原文を訂正しました。
sen.e: Quruli, The Real Group, rei harakami, Tetsuhiro DAIKU and the Carpenters, Asa, Kazumasa ODA, Haruomi HOSONO and the World Shyness, Humbert Humbert, and Lana and Flip.
